definition: sail/Taiwan pr. [fan2], except 帆布[fan1 bu4] canvas
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: At Xixiu Beach you can enjoy the national sailing and windsurfing teams training on the sea.
sentences.chinese: 在西秀海滩，你能赏识国家帆板队在海上的训练。

sentences.english: Why can't I railing my board today?
sentences.chinese: 为什么我今天没能把帆板倾起来？

sentences.english: The behavior of the satellites and their flexible solar arrays are imitated on the single axis gas bearing turntable (SAGBT) and flexible beam separately.
sentences.chinese: 用单轴气浮台和挠性梁分别模拟卫星本体和太阳帆板。

sentences.english: It's windy and warm, so it's good weather for windsurfing.
sentences.chinese: 今天有风而且暖和，所以这种天气很适合做帆板运动。

sentences.english: How long did the police spend looking for the windsurfers?
sentences.chinese: 警察花了多不时间去营救那两个玩帆板的人？

sentences.english: Mostly , the aortic and mistral valves are most often affected .
sentences.chinese: 大部分，主动脉和帆板阀是最常见的影响。

sentences.english: She gets her kicks from windsurfing and skiing.
sentences.chinese: 她从帆板运动和滑雪运动中得到极大的乐趣。

sentences.english: Windsurfing is not popular with students at all.
sentences.chinese: 帆板运动一点也不受学生们的欢迎。

sentences.english: In sailing, for example, Yin Jian won China's first medal when she took windsurfing gold.
sentences.chinese: 比如帆船，殷剑摘取了中国帆板的第一块金牌。

sentences.english: Because we will do a lot of things there, such as playing volleyball , windsurfing .
sentences.chinese: 因为我们会做的事情很多，如打排球，帆板运动。

sentences.english: I learnt in the Menai Straits off Anglesey at 19. It's an escape from thinking.
sentences.chinese: 我19岁的时候在梅奈海峡的安格尔西岛学会帆板。

definition: stand-up paddleboarding (SUP)/stand-up paddleboard/blade of a propeller/blade of an oar
